Updates may reflect TfL products and services you have used before, and may be sent by post, email, telephone or text message.
We will not disclose your details to third parties for marketing purposes.
If you sign up for mobile phone text alerts, we can send you important information about your account or service.
For example, if you have Auto Pay we will tell you if there is a problem taking your monthly payment. If you have an active discount we will remind you when it needs to be renewed.
If you opt in for mobile phone text receipts, we will send your receipt numbers by text message.

You can choose to receive a receipt by email for Congestion Charge, ULEZ charge and LEZ charge payments (not Auto Pay) every time you pay ('Immediate' ), or as a single consolidated receipt sent once a month ('Monthly consolidated' ).
